When this creature enters, target creature you control soars. [i](Put a flying counter on it. If it already has flying, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]

Enchant nonland permanent
When this enchantment enters, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

Flying

Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with flying, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Flight— the eternal engima of mankind. We simulate it in so many ways but will never experience it the way birds do.”
—Jerens, master ornithologist[/i]

cards.rules_text:

• Return each nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards.
Turbulence [i](Choose additional modes up to the number of spells you've already cast this turn.)[/i]

When this enchantment enters, target creature you control soars. [i](Put a flying counter on it. If it already has flying, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if a counter was placed on a creature you controlled this turn, draw a card.

• Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
• Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

Whenever you activate an uplift ability, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Menace
When Jaka enters, destroy target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less.

cards.special_text2:
Whenever a creature with mana value 3 or less deals combat damage to Jaka, destroy it.
[+2]: Jaka deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
[-X]: Exile target card in an opponent's graveyard with mana value X. You may cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor_text: [i]While many ornith accepted the advent of Zephyian civilization and assimilated with their society, the vast majority formed closed colonies at the edges of the Basin Sea.[/i]

Whenever a Cloud you control enters, each opponent mills three cards.

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {R}.
{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
At the beginning of your end step, you may exile The Phoenix Seed. If you do, exile up to X artifact, instant, or sorcery cards from your graveyard, where X is the number of spells you cast this turn. You may cast those cards during your next turn.

Flying, vigilance
{T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it.

{T}: Add {C}.
When this land enters, you may pay {2}. When you do, destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. That player may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

As long as you control a Vehicle, this creature gets +2/+0.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Clear skies once again over Harmony Airfield, folks! Now, whichever you're fonder of, your hat or your purse, hold onto that!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if this creature is tapped, create a Treasure token.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: Exile the top card of target opponent's library face down. You may look at and play that card as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type may be spent to cast it. Activate only as a sorcery.

When this artifact enters, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a Cloud card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add three mana in any combination of colors. You can't spend this mana to cast spells or activate abilities of non-Cloud permanents.

Search your library for up to three basic land cards and/or Cloud cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. At the beginning of your next end step, return two lands you control to their owner's hand.

—Green Air mantra[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, scry 2, then draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell that has turbulence, this enchantment deals 1 damage to target opponent for each mode chosen beyond the first.

Uplift – {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Scry 1. Create a tapped Treasure token. [i](To uplift, tap one creature with flying and one without.)[/i]

Choose one–
• Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
• Target player creates X Treasure tokens.
Turbulence [i](Choose additional modes up to the number of spells you've already cast this turn.)[/i]

When this creature enters, exile target player's graveyard. You gain 1 life for each card type among cards exiled this way.
Suspend 3–{B} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {B} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]

When this creature enters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token and a Treasure token.
Whenever you attack, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature. If you do, untap each creature you control. They get +1/+1 until end of turn.

When this Vehicle becomes a creature, any number of other target Vehicles you control each become creatures in addition to their other types until end of turn.
Crew 5 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 5 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
Uplift – {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a Treasure token. [i](To uplift, tap one creature with flying and one without.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Don't worry, we'll build a new ship. I do it every week.”[/i]

Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Nip deals 1 damage to that player and you create a Treasure token.
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent was dealt noncombat damage this turn, exile that many cards from the top of your library. You may play those cards during your next turn.

cards.rules_text:
Reach
When this creature enters, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.
Suspend 3–{1}{G} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{G} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]

Reach
This creature's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
When this creature enters, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying an opponent controls.

Trample
Whenever one or more counters are put on this creature, you may have it fight target creature an opponent controls.
{1}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

Vigilance, haste
{1}, {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand. If a nonland card was exiled this way, put a number of time counters on it equal to its mana value and it gains suspend.

This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature with flying you control.
Flying, vigilance, ward {2}
Creatures you control with flying crew Vehicles as though their power were doubled.
Crew 8

Ward–Discard a land card.
Gengrin can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Whenever you attack, you may discard a land card. When you do, double the power of target attacking creature until end of turn.

When this creature enters, draw two cards, then discard a card.
Whenever a Cloud you control enters, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. Its flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Target opponent chooses main or combat. That player skips each instance of the chosen phase during their next turn.
